article.title: Evolving the 90% Pharmaceutical Library
article.author: Basile, V.A.Smith, R.W.
article.text: The growing need for library space dictated a quantitative study to ascertain user requirements. A monitoring operation has been established whereby data are continuously collected on the use made of periodicals shelved in a restricted storage area. The data, obtained from photocopy request forms, identify the core collection of journals which satisfies 90% of our library research requirements.
